-    "postinstall": "npm run install:all",
-    "install:all": "cd packages/db && npm install && cd ../../apps/web && npm install",
     "dev": "cd apps/web && npm run dev",

     "prisma:generate": "cd packages/db && npx prisma generate",

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "sabir-khatabook",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Bilingual SaaS ledger for agricultural sellers",
  "private": true,
  "workspaces": [
    "apps/*",
    "packages/*"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "postinstall": "npm run install:all",
    "install:all": "cd packages/db && npm install && cd ../../apps/web && npm install",
    "dev": "cd apps/web && npm run dev",
    "build": "cd apps/web && npm run build",
    "start": "cd apps/web && npm run start",
    "prisma:generate": "cd packages/db && npx prisma generate",
    "prisma:migrate": "cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate dev",
    "prisma:seed": "cd packages/db && npx tsx prisma/seed.ts",
    "prisma:deploy": "cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate deploy",
    "test": "jest"
  },
  "keywords": ["ledger", "agriculture", "saas", "bilingual"],
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/jest": "^29.5.8",
    "@types/supertest": "^6.0.2",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "supertest": "^6.3.3",
    "ts-jest": "^29.1.1",
    "typescript": "^5.3.2"
  }
}
